section.para: To create a new Hot Key, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Hot Key, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select a keyboard keystroke from the list of available keystrokes. The list will include all keystrokes which may linked to a specific action. Only one action at a time may be assigned to a single keystroke. For multiple actions, multiple keystrokes must be used.
Display lists actions you may associate with keystrokes.
